info.author: Francesco Palumbo
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License v3 or later (GPLv3+)
info.description: ncmon is a tool to display system resources. It needs a configuration file; default one  is  located at ~/.ncmonrc but it is possible to specify another one using -f option. I wrote this little program to get multiple info bars on multiple tmux panes (without the need to annidate sessions etc.), so it probably  should  be  more  useful  if  used  within  a terminal multiplexer such as tmux or screen, although it could be used as standalone.
info.license: ncmon is licensed under the GNU General Plublic License v3. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>
info.name: ncmon
info.html_description: ncmon is a tool to display system resources. It needs a configuration file; default one is located at ~/.ncmonrc but it is possible to specify another one using -f option. I wrote this little program to get multiple info bars on multiple tmux panes (without the need to annidate sessions etc.), so it probably should be more useful if used within a terminal multiplexer such as tmux or screen, although it could be used as standalone.
